channel.title: North American on Korolev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in North American on Korolev Blog

item.title: Install me
item.description: I am not at all interested in your program. I have plenty of my own problems and a long list of tasks. I only visited your site because of unverified rumors that your program would solve all my problems. Please forgive my skepticism. If eye-tracking studies are correct, I’ve already read the headline and am scrolling through the page looking for the blue underlined link Download Now. By the way, if I accessed this page from a browser running on Linux and my IP is from Canada, it can be assumed that I need the Linux version from a North American mirror, so please don’t ask about that. I understand that the file download dialog will open immediately, so I’ll send this thing to my downloads folder and continue reading.
